name: Dullpain
description:
Dullpain is a 2D side-scrolling, interaction, and storytelling indie game developed by one person.
The waxing moon turns full, yet a broken heart is hard to be healed.
A flawless dream is beautiful, yet is past without any pity real?



Hundreds of branches and multiple endings. With the thread, branching missions, and dialogues with every NPC, you could get to know who they are, know their thoughts, experience their stories, empathizing with them.
Small interaction in the game maintains a high degree of freedom and kinds of details in daily life, creating an immersive atmosphere. At the same time, sowed seeds in every branch are waiting for you to discover.
Full-process dub. Voice actors and actresses tell us the secretary of every story and make it vivid.  




The game is set in different time and space in different places. 8 controllable characters with independent and complete stories. Unravel the secretary of Jingwen’s ability to repair memory through different perspectives. Entangle detineies of every characters.



{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/补2.gif


Cutscene. Feel the emotion behind each plot in the immersive atmosphere.
Exquisite standing pictures and CG of characters present their features and personalities. There much be a character that resonates with you in the game.




Reach characters you want to talk with. Different phone-call and message events are designed during certain progress of the plot, so your emotion from the sense of substitution could be released.
